translations: 长耳大野兔（主要生长于北美西部）

sentences.sentence: The bleak ground pullulated with jackrabbits.
sentences.translation: 荒凉的土地上到处是长耳大野兔。

sentences.sentence: It is illegal to shoot jackrabbits from the back of a streetcar.
sentences.translation: 市内有轨电车的后部射击长耳大野兔是违法的。

sentences.sentence: He will, I presume, come closer to jackrabbits than I have been able to in recent years.
sentences.translation: 我想，在长逐长耳大野兔这件事上，牠一定会表现得比我最后这几年来得好。
